title: Dragging down the full-screen blue title bar does not exit the full-screen mode.
author: HubKing
body_snippet:
If I use Microsoft's RDP client, in the full-screen mode, I can drag down the blue title bar at the top to exit the full-screen mode. mRemoteNG has a very similarly-looking blue title bar, but dragging down does not work.

## Expected Behavior
Dragging down the blue title bar exits the full-screen mode. MS's RDP client behaves that way, and in many of today's windowing system I have tried (Windows, Gnome, XFCE, etc), if a window is "maximised" and I drag down the title bar, the window becomes...
